mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manometer_record (station_id, machine_id, machine_id_nnu, measure_time, pressure1, pressure2, pressure3, pressure4, pressure5, pressure6, in_time) VALUES (#{idGroup.station_id}, #{idGroup.machine_id}, #{idGroup.machine_id_nnu}, #{idGroup.measure_time}, #{pressure1}, #{pressure2}, #{pressure3}, #{pressure4}, #{pressure5}, #{pressure6}, #{in_time})
